    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Command
    Interface for all commands.
    DataLoader
    Loader for all data.
    End_Command
    Command for exit game.
    Explore_Command
    Command for explore current room.
    Game
    Game logics.
    Go_Command
    Command for go from current room to the next one.
    Help_Command
    Command for giving player all possible commands available.
    Hint_Command
    Command for giving player a hint.
    Inventory
    Inventory of the player.
    Item
    Items in the game.
    Main
    Main.
    NPC
    NPCs in the game.
    Place_Command
    Command for placing item in current room.
    Player
    Player that plays the game.
    Room
    Rooms in the world.
    Speak_Command
    Command for talking with NPC in current room.
    Take_Command
    Command for taking an item from current room.
    Use_Command
    Command for using an item that is supposed to be used.
    UserInterface
    This class makes it all readable and communicates with the player.
